name: uneq12i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c3)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)

comment: Equality inference for the union of two classes. (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-2004.) (Proof shortened by Eric Schmidt, 26-Jan-2007.)
